description: Humorous play on number 'seven' sounds like 'Sprite' soft drink
title: Seven-Up Mixup
n_1: Tom checks a list in the store.
c1_1: Need to stock up on Sprite!
n_2: At the store, Tom counts the cans.
c1_2: One, two, three... this is all?
n_3: Back home, Jerry checks the receipt.
n_4: Tom recounts and finds the mix-up.
